Reason: The _journalDiskSync configuration option is performance-sensitive. From the system level perspective, enabling sync to disk can have a significant impact on performance due to the disk I/O operations required for syncing. This can lead to notable performance variations at the system level. From the configuration-related code perspective, the use of _journalDiskSync directly affects the creation of a PersistentJournal with the sync option passed as a parameter, indicating that it involves performance-related operations that are time-expensive and memory-expensive.
